longBusinessSummary: The fund normally invests at least 80% of its assets in equity securities. The advisor may invest in stocks within a broad range of market capitalizations, but tends to focus on large capitalization companies with market capitalizations similar to those of companies in the Russell 1000 Index as selected by the fund's sub-adviser, Wellington Management Company LLP ("Wellington Management"). The fund may invest up to 20% of its net assets in the securities of foreign issuers and non-dollar securities.
